items.sentence: A good lawyer would leave no stone unturned in his efforts to defend his client.
Tom volunteers in a community outreach program designed to help homeless people.
Tom likes to tinker with things because he believes there's always a better way.
Tom works at night and Mary works during the day, so they seldom see each other.
As long as you're here, why don't you show Tom how to do what he's trying to do.
Just because you didn't get into Harvard doesn't mean it's the end of the world.
They're building something across the street, but we're not yet sure what it is.
Are you sure Tom and Mary are married? I thought that they were just colleagues.
Tom's was the first name on the list of persons of interest after Mary's murder.
Tom agreed to go with me, so we said goodbye to the others, and went on our way.
